title: Apple oatmeal cookies
ingredients: ['110g (4 oz) butter, softened', '175g (6 oz) honey', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '90g (3 oz) stoneground wholemeal flour', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '3/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '125g (4 1/4 oz) porridge oats', '1 apple, cored and chopped']
